title: Unspecified error occurred. Please view log files for more detail.
body: Updated antivirus, firewall off. still getting this error. Never happened before. Please suggest. Error message -Unspecified error occurred. Please view log files for more detail.

replies.body:
Unspecified Errors usually pop up in the patcher and usually indicate a connection issue.  Essentially, the patcher needs to get files from the Patcher Servers, but if the computer is blocking this connection in any way, it will pop up this error message.  To get this resolved, make sure to complete all of the steps in our [Connection Issues Article](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues).  It has the most common solutions that should get this fixed.

Give me a heads up if nothing seems to work!
